000: This is where the railway to the military domain branches off
001: The tracks runs through a forest.
002: On a regular distance I saw iron strips connected to the sleepers.
003: At the left the fences of the domain. The track has been blocked by this obstacle. It's useless since the track has a dead end in a few 100 metres.
004: Here the line branches into two lines running along through a future forest.
006: A loading platform, probably for military vehicles since the signs "Military domain" are everywhere
007: Near the platform stands an old freight van
00O: This is where the railway to the military domain branches off
